articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: BCCI, PCB Meet To Finalise Asia Cup Details. Here's What Was Decided - NDTV Sports
articles.description: IPL chairman Arun Dhumal confirmed that BCCI secretary Jay Shah and PCB head Zaka Ashraf held Asia Cup schedule talks during a meet.
articles.content: The much anticipated Asia Cup games between India and Pakistan will be held in Sri Lanka as Rohit Sharma led team won't travel to Pakistan, IPL chairman Arun Dhumal confirmed on Wednesday. Dhumal, wh… [+1316 chars]
